item.title: About
item.description:
About Zachari

A society grows great when old men plant trees whose shade they know they shall never sit.

A quote that I’ve had stashed away in my journal that has really stuck with me throughout the years.

I’ve had business ideas, I’ve committed to them and I have failed a few times but I have also had plenty of success.

From experience I know a lot of other founders out there come across their fair-share of struggles or critical turning points. This lead to an idea.
